refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: gimp_pattern_select_widget_new ()
refsect2.programlisting: GtkWidget * gimp_pattern_select_widget_new (const gchar *title, const gchar *pattern_name, GimpRunPatternCallback callback, gpointer data);

warning.para: gimp_pattern_select_widget_new is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Creates a new GtkWidget that completely controls the selection of a pattern. This widget is suitable for placement in a table in a plug-in dialog.

listitem.simpara: Title of the dialog to use or NULL to use the default title.
Initial pattern name or NULL to use current selection.
A function to call when the selected pattern changes.
A pointer to arbitary data to be used in the call to callback.
A GtkWidget that you can use in your UI.

refsect2.title: gimp_pattern_select_widget_close ()

warning.para: gimp_pattern_select_widget_close is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Closes the popup window associated with widget.

refsect2.title: gimp_pattern_select_widget_set ()

warning.para: gimp_pattern_select_widget_set is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets the current pattern for the pattern select widget. Calls the callback function if one was supplied in the call to gimp_pattern_select_widget_new().

listitem.simpara: Pattern name to set. NULL means no change.
